full_text:
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT, IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY, FLORIDA
CASE NO. 2006CF009454A
STATE OF FLORIDA
vs.
JEFFREY EPSTEIN,
Defendant.
AGREED ORDER CONTINUING TRIAL, CANCELING PLEA CONFERENCE AND SETTING CASE FOR A PLEA CONFERENCE
This cause came on to be heard upon the joint motion of the parties requesting that the Defendant's trial date be continued because of new information that needs to be investigated and the Court being fully advised, it is hereby
ORDERED AND ADJUDGED that the Defendant's case scheduled for trial on January 7, 2008 is continued, that the plea conference scheduled for January 4, 2008 is canceled, and the case is scheduled for a plea conference on March 10, 2008 at 8:30 a.m.
DONE AND ORDERED in West Palm Beach, Palm Beach County, Florida, this 2nd day of January, 2008.
SANDRA McSORLEY
Circuit Court Judge
Copies:
Jack A. Goldberger, Esquire One Clearlake Ctr, Ste 1400, 250 Australian Ave So. Lanna Belohlavek, ASA (interoffice mail) WPBeach, FL, 33401
401 N. Dixie Hwy West Palm Beach, FL 33401
COPY
07/26/17 Page 88 of 114 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030441
